title: A remark on the number of automorphisms of finite abelian groups
abstract:
Let $Ab_0$ be the class of finite abelian groups and consider the function
$f:Ab_0\longrightarrow(0,\infty)$ given by $f(G)=\frac{|{\rm Aut}(G)|}{|G|}$\,,
where ${\rm Aut}(G)$ is the automorphism group of a finite abelian group $G$.
In this short note, we prove that the image of $f$ is a dense set in
$[0,\infty)$.
